Producer: Ric Roman Waugh, Jonathan King, Michel Litvak, Gary Michael Walters
Production Co: Bold Films, DirecTV, Relativity Media, Participant Media
Rating: R (Pervasive Language|Brief Nudity|Some Drug Use|Strong Bloody Violence)
Synopsis: Recently released from prison, a gang member finds himself forced by his leaders to orchestrate a major crime with a rival gang.
Title: Shot Caller
